allCards.name: Ghost
allCards.text: Reveals its origins when in a specific location.

allCards.name: Drunken Dwarf
allCards.text: Once per turn, can destroy wizard mind bomb creeper.

allCards.name: Archmage Sedridor
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose one rune keeper to destroy.

allCards.name: Vampyre Juvinate
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal the rune crossbow from another player.

allCards.name: Imp
allCards.text: At the end of a players turn or when discarded teleport to another player.

allCards.name: Aris Maye
allCards.text: When using the Scry and Acquire card, don't discard it.

allCards.name: Reldo
allCards.text: When using the Historical Records card, don't discard it.

allCards.name: Torag
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal Dharok or Karil.

allCards.name: Verac
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal Guthan or Ahrim

allCards.name: Guthan
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal Torag or Karil

allCards.name: Dharok
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal Verac or Ahrim

allCards.name: Karil
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal Verac or Dharok

allCards.name: Ahrim
allCards.text: Once per turn, steal Torag or Guthan

allCards.name: Abyssal Sire
allCards.text: Once per turn, can draw another 8 cards and from those play 5.

allCards.name: Abyssal Demon
allCards.text: Once per turn, select a keeper to swap with.

allCards.name: Chaos Rune
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose to draw 1 and play it.

allCards.name: Nature Rune
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose one equipment keeper to destroy

allCards.name: Law Rune
allCards.text: Once per turn, teleport to a random location.

allCards.name: Cosmic Rune
allCards.text: Once per turn, randomize one non location rule.

allCards.name: Ghostspeak Amulet
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose to summon a ghost.

allCards.name: Anti Dragonfire Shield
allCards.text: Once per turn, can destroy elvarg creeper.

allCards.name: Rune Crossbow
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose one living keeper to destroy

allCards.name: Avas Attractor
allCards.text: Once per turn, attract a card to your hand from an opposing player of your choice.

allCards.name: Dramen Staff
allCards.text: Once per turn, teleport to Zanaris.

allCards.name: Bronze Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to a Iron Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Iron Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to a Steel Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Steel Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to a Black Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Black Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to a Mithril Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Mithril Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to an Adamant Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Adamant Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to an Rune Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Rune Defender
allCards.text: After playing a goal upgrade to a Dragon Defender and return to hand.

allCards.name: Dragon Defender
allCards.text: Once per turn, Create Goal Dragon Defender in hand.

allCards.name: Cake
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose to draw 1 card.

allCards.name: Anti Poison
allCards.text: Once per turn, can destroy the poison creeper.

allCards.name: Unsired
allCards.text: Once per turn, draw an item from the font of consumption.

allCards.name: Elvarg
allCards.text: A creeper that attaches to equipment disabling any use effects and preventing that player from winning.

allCards.name: Poison
allCards.text: A creeper that attaches to a living keeper disabling any use effects and preventing that player from winning.

allCards.name: Wizard Mind Bomb
allCards.text: Attaches to living keepers disabling, effects and prevents winning.

allCards.name: Your First Spell
allCards.text: To cast your first spell you must acquire the following reagents: |air rune| or |air staff|, |mind rune|.

allCards.name: Restless Ghost
allCards.text: In the cemetary of lumbridge you must put the ghost to rest. QUEST REQUIREMENTS: |ghost|, |ghostspeak amulet|, |father aereck|

allCards.name: Ready To Slay A Dragon
allCards.text: Speak to |Duke Horacio| to get your |anti dragonfire shield|, then you can believe you can fight a dragon.

allCards.name: Dragon Slayer
allCards.text: Find your way to |crandor|, off the coast of misthalin and fight the dragon known as |Elvarg|. |anti dragonfire shield| is required.

allCards.name: Cook's Assistant
allCards.text: For most new adventurers, they end up helping |Cook| get ingredients for his |Cake| for the eternal duke's birthday.

allCards.name: Lumbridge Citizens
allCards.text: Collection type: lumbridge residents including the likes of |Duke Horacio|, |Cook| and |Father Aereck|

allCards.name: Elemental Runes
allCards.text: Collection type: any 3 of |Air rune|, |Water rune|, |Earth rune| or |Fire rune|

allCards.name: Rune Mysteries
allCards.text: The path to unlocking runecraft requires the power of Air, QUEST REQUIREMENTS: |Air Rune|, |Archmage Sedridor|, |Duke Horacio|

allCards.name: How to become a Chaos Dwarf
allCards.text: Under the curse of zamorak dwarves that use magic end up becoming corrupt and turning into chaos dwarves, requirements: |Drunken Dwarf|, |Wizard Mind Bomb|

allCards.name: Drunken Wizard
allCards.text: A wizards favourite drinks got to be a |wizard mind bomb| right, so bring one to |Archmage Sedridor| for reasons.

allCards.name: Rock Cake
allCards.text: A secret cake baked only by dwarfs, requirements: |Drunken Dwarf|, |Cake|

allCards.name: Alchemy
allCards.text: To cast alchemy spell you must have a |Nature rune| and |Fire Rune|

allCards.name: Cursed
allCards.text: Not the spell, but someone who gains all 3 creepers must have bad luck right well now they can win, |Elvarg|, |Wizard Mind Bomb|, |Poison|

allCards.name: Regicide
allCards.text: Requirements: |King Roald|, |Poison|. Wait this isn't how regicide goes.

allCards.name: Animal Magnetism
allCards.text: The quest all aspiring newbie rangers rush to for some QoL ammo reservation, Requirements: |Ava|, |Ghostspeak Amulet|, |Ava's Attractor|

allCards.name: Ranged Setup
allCards.text: The power houses of early game range. Requirements: |Rune Crossbow|, |Ava's Attractor|

allCards.name: Draynor Manor
allCards.text: Collection type: residents of draynor manor |Ernest|, |Ava|, |Ghost|

allCards.name: Swampmans Nightmares
allCards.text: |Rune Crossbow| and |Vampyre Juvinate|. You get the rest.

allCards.name: Entrana
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Law Rune|, |Dramen Staff|

allCards.name: Smuggler
allCards.text: Since equipment isn't allowed on entrana, find a way to get them there. Requirements: |Entrana|, |equipment_subtype| and |equipment_subtype| keepers

allCards.name: Misthalins Nobility
allCards.text: Collection Type: |King Roald|, |Duke Horacio|

allCards.name: Mind Goblin
allCards.text: They exist. |Mind Rune|, |Goblin|

allCards.name: Zanaris
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Cosmic Rune|, |Dramen Staff|

allCards.name: Catalytic Runes
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Mind Rune|, |Chaos Rune|

allCards.name: Utility Runes
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Law Rune|, |Nature Rune|, |Cosmic Rune|

allCards.name: Misthalins Altars
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Water Rune|, |Earth Rune|

allCards.name: Zamorak
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Wilderness|, |Imp|, |Chaos Rune|

allCards.name: Starter Monsters
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Imp|, |Goblin|, |Ernest|(he's a chicken right)

allCards.name: Morytania's Undead
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Morytania|, |Ghost|, |Vampyre Juvinate|

allCards.name: Port Phasmatys
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Ghost|, |Ghost|, |Ghost|

allCards.name: Chaos
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Abyss|, |Chaos Rune|

allCards.name: Juvinile 'Rare Drop'
allCards.text: After defeating a |Vampyre juvinate|, you have been graced with the staff of utmost versatility the |Air Staff|.

allCards.name: Tribrid
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Rune Scimitar|, |Rune Crossbow|, |Air Staff|

allCards.name: Melee Setup
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Rune Scimitar|, |Anti dragonfire shield|

allCards.name: Chaos Dwarf
allCards.text: Collection Type: |Chaos Rune|, |Drunken Dwarf|

allCards.name: Poison Removal
allCards.text: just gotta drink |Anti Poison| to cure |Poison|.

allCards.name: Prevent Toxicity?
allCards.text: Does a |Anti Poison| protect from being told to sit in the |Wilderness|.

allCards.name: Varrock
allCards.text: Collection type: |Aris Maye|, |Reldo|, |King Roald|

allCards.name: Recipe for Disaster
allCards.text: A long journey begins after speaking to the |Cook|. Freeing the members of the banquet will require help from |Aris Maye|.

allCards.name: Plot Twisting Chicken
allCards.text: Didn't you know that |Ernest| the chicken was actually a astral projection from the evil chicken shrine in |Zanaris|.

allCards.name: Sire
allCards.text: The |Abyssal Sire| brings instant victory.

allCards.name: Jackpot
allCards.text: Among the loot from the |Unsired| is a chance for an easy win.

allCards.name: Abyssal Weapons
allCards.text: Collection type: |Abyssal Whip| and |Abyssal Dagger|

allCards.name: Whip Drop
allCards.text: The iconic drop of an |Abyssal Demon| is the |Abyssal Whip|.

allCards.name: Dragon Defender!
allCards.text: A long grind at cyclops in the warriors guild yields a |Dragon Defender|.

allCards.name: Spear and Shield
allCards.text: A spear that can pierce anything(|Verac|) and an impenetrable shield(|Torag|).

allCards.name: Risk and Safety
allCards.text: Stay close to 0 hitpoints(|Dharok|) and Heal up to full(|Guthan|).

allCards.name: Plash and Pierce
allCards.text: The sound of magic(|Ahrim|) and crossbows(|Karil|) resounds through the crypts.

allCards.name: Misthalin
allCards.text: When this card is in play, draw 1 at the end of each turn.

allCards.name: Abyss
allCards.text: Once per turn, choose whether to draw 1 and play it.

allCards.name: Asgarnia
allCards.text: When this card is in play, there can be 2 different goals in play. Only 1 is required to win.

allCards.name: Morytania
allCards.text: When this card is in play, Ghosts have a 10% chance to spawn at the end of turns.

allCards.name: Wilderness
allCards.text: When this card is in play, once per turn, choose a keeper to challenge and steal.

allCards.name: Entrana
allCards.text: When this card is in play, on arrival everyone must discard all equipment keepers in play.

allCards.name: Crandor
allCards.text: When this card is in play, at the end of every turn discard one card.

allCards.name: Zanaris
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each turn one rule will randomize except location.

allCards.name: Draw 2
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will draw 2 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Draw 3
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will draw 3 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Draw 4
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will draw 4 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Draw 5
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will draw 5 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Play 2
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will play 2 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Play 3
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will play 3 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Play 4
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will play 4 cards per turn.

allCards.name: Play All
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player will play all cards per turn.

allCards.name: Hand Limit 1
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player has to discard down to 1 card to end their turn.

allCards.name: Hand Limit 2
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player has to discard down to 2 card to end their turn.

allCards.name: Hand Limit 3
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player has to discard down to 3 card to end their turn.

allCards.name: Keeper Limit 3
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player can have 3 keepers in play.

allCards.name: Keeper Limit 4
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player can have 4 keepers in play.

allCards.name: Keeper Limit 1
allCards.text: When this card is in play, each player can have 1 keepers in play.

allCards.name: Keeper Unlimited
allCards.text: When this card is in play, there is no limit on how many keepers can be in play.

allCards.name: Teleblock
allCards.text: When this card is in play, location can not be changed.

allCards.name: Teleport
allCards.text: teleport to a random location.

allCards.name: Rules Reset
allCards.text: When played, all rules will be returned to their base values from the start of the game.

allCards.name: Pick up all keepers
allCards.text: When played, all players must pick up all their keepers in play.

allCards.name: Trade Hands
allCards.text: When played, choose a player to trade hands with.

allCards.name: Reset One Rule
allCards.text: When played, choose 1 rule to reset.

allCards.name: Let's Simplify
allCards.text: When played, choose up to half the rules to reset.

allCards.name: Draw 3, Play 2
allCards.text: Draw 3 cards, out of those 3 cards you must choose 2 to play and finally discard the remaining card.

allCards.name: Draw 2, Use'em
allCards.text: Draw 2 cards and immediately use them.

allCards.name: Draw 5, discard 2
allCards.text: Draw 5 cards, out of those 5 cards you must choose 3 to play and finally discard the remaining cards.

allCards.name: Everyone draw 1
allCards.text: All players draw 1 card.

allCards.name: Steal A Keeper
allCards.text: Choose a keeper on field to take into your possession.

allCards.name: Exchange Keepers
allCards.text: Choose 2 keepers on the field and swap their locations.

allCards.name: Everyone Discard 1
allCards.text: Each player will immediately discard one card.

allCards.name: Summon Ghost
allCards.text: Summon a ghost to add to your keepers.

allCards.name: Destroy Keeper
allCards.text: Choose a keeper/creeper to destroy.

allCards.name: Scry and Acquire
allCards.text: See into the future and choose a card to acquire.

allCards.name: Historical Research
allCards.text: Look through past records and find the location of a card to acquire.

allCards.name: Direct Teleport
allCards.text: Choose any location to teleport to.

allCards.name: Draw 8, Play 5
allCards.text: Draw 8 cards, play 5 of them and discard the rest.

allCards.name: Attract Card
allCards.text: Attracts a card from an opposing players hand.

allCards.name: STEAL RCB
allCards.text: STEAL!, STEAL!, STEAL!

allCards.name: RULE FLUX
allCards.text: Randomize a rule.

allCards.name: Swap
allCards.text: Swaps places with a selected keeper.

allCards.name: Self Destruct
allCards.text: Any keeper that uses this will be discarded.

allCards.name: Telestop
allCards.text: Out of turn - Stop a teleport| During turn - Teleport to Misthalin.

allCards.name: Cancel Plans
allCards.text: Out of turn - Stop a goal card| During turn - Discard all goals in play.

allCards.name: Belay That
allCards.text: Out of turn - Stop an action card| During turn - Everyone discards one.

allCards.name: That's Mine
allCards.text: Out of turn - Steal a keeper being stolen.| During turn - Choose a keeper to steal.

allCards.name: Veto
allCards.text: Out of turn - Stop another player while they are playing a rule card| During turn - Reset up to 3 rules.

allCards.name: It's a Trap
allCards.text: Out of turn - Reflect a destroy card.| During turn - Choose a keeper to discard.
